title: [Solhaven, Baron's Bridge Road]
description: Tidewater Road intersects from the west, and the crenellated circle of Lornon Court, lit by the glowing arch of flame, lies just a few paces to the east.  Further to the north, lanterns along the arch of Baron's Bridge are visible, while braziers light a conical red and yellow building far to the south.

Tidewater Road intersects from the west, and the crenellated circle of Lornon Court, lit by the glowing arch of flame, lies just a few paces to the east.  Further to the north, lanterns along the arch of Baron's Bridge are visible.

Tidewater Road intersects from the west, and the crenellated circle of Lornon Court, with its towering glaes arch, lies just a few paces to the east.  Further to the north the arch of Baron's Bridge is visible.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
